languages.text: "Пожалуй, я воздержусь от обсуждений Лорд-капитана за ее спиной — тем более на ее судне. Кому как не мне знать, что шепотки привлекают особо пристальное внимание!" {n}Кунрад смеется и качает головой.{/n} "Достаточно будет сказать, что Ее Светлость — предержательница священного {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Торгового Патента{/g} и обладательница невероятной власти и привилегий. Даже при вашем особом положении — прошу, не вызывайте ее гнев непочтительностью или тугодумием. Леди Теодора терпеть не может оба этих качества".

traits.locale_text: "Пожалуй, я воздержусь от обсуждений Лорд-капитана за ее спиной — тем более на ее судне. Кому как не мне знать, что шепотки привлекают особо пристальное внимание!" {n}Кунрад смеется и качает головой.{/n} "Достаточно будет сказать, что Ее Светлость — предержательница священного {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Торгового Патента{/g} и обладательница невероятной власти и привилегий. Даже при вашем особом положении — прошу, не вызывайте ее гнев непочтительностью или тугодумием. Леди Теодора терпеть не может оба этих качества".

languages.text: "I would rather not discuss the Lord Captain behind her back — especially not on board her ship. No one knows better than I that whispers are wont to attract particularly close attention!" {n}Voigtvir laughs and shakes his head.{/n} "Suffice it to say that Her Ladyship is the bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}, and a woman of immense power and entitlement. However privileged your position may be, I ask that you do not incur her anger by being disrespectful or obtuse. Lady Theodora despises both qualities."
languages.original_text: "Пожалуй, я воздержусь от обсуждений Лорд-капитана за ее спиной — тем более на ее судне. Кому как не мне знать, что шепотки привлекают особо пристальное внимание!" {n}Кунрад смеется и качает головой.{/n} "Достаточно будет сказать, что Ее Светлость — предержательница священного {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Торгового Патента{/g} и обладательница невероятной власти и привилегий. Даже при вашем особом положении — прошу, не вызывайте ее гнев непочтительностью или тугодумием. Леди Теодора терпеть не может оба этих качества".

traits.locale_text: "I would rather not discuss the Lord Captain behind her back — especially not aboard her ship. Who knows better than I that whispers are wont to attract particularly close attention!" {n}Voigtvir laughs and shakes his head.{/n} "Suffice it to say that Her Ladyship is the God-Emperor's anointed, bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}, and a woman of immense power and entitlement. However privileged your position may be, I ask that you do not incur her anger by being disrespectful or obtuse. Lady Theodora despises both of those qualities."

However privileged your position may be, I ask that you do not incur her anger by being disrespectful or obtuse. Lady Theodora despises both of those qualities."

However privileged your position may be, I ask that you do not incur her anger by being disrespectful or obtuse. Lady Theodora despises both qualities."

"I would rather not discuss the Lord Captain behind her back — especially not on board her ship. No one knows better than I that whispers are wont to attract particularly close attention!" {n}Voigtvir laughs and shakes his head.{/n} "Suffice it to say that Her Ladyship is the bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}, and a woman of immense power and entitlement. However privileged your position may be, I ask that you do not incur her anger by being disrespectful or obtuse. Lady Theodora despises both qualities."

languages.text: “我并不愿意在背后讨论舰长大人的事情，尤其不愿在她的船上这么做。窃窃私语往往会引起尤为密切的关注，没有人比我更清楚这一点。”{n}维特威尔大笑起来，摇了摇头。{/n}“我只想说，西奥多拉夫人是神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易授状{/g}的持有人，拥有着无与伦比的权力与资源。无论您的地位有多么优越，我都希望您不要因为缺乏尊重或缺乏远见而招致她的愤怒，西奥多拉夫人尤为鄙夷这两种缺陷。”
languages.original_text: "I would rather not discuss the Lord Captain behind her back — especially not on board her ship. No one knows better than I that whispers are wont to attract particularly close attention!" {n}Voigtvir laughs and shakes his head.{/n} "Suffice it to say that Her Ladyship is the bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}, and a woman of immense power and entitlement. However privileged your position may be, I ask that you do not incur her anger by being disrespectful or obtuse. Lady Theodora despises both qualities."

traits.locale_text: “我并不愿意在背后讨论舰长大人的事情，尤其不愿在她的船上这么做。窃窃私语往往会引起尤为密切的关注，没有人比我更清楚这一点。”{n}维特威尔大笑起来，摇了摇头。{/n}“我只想说，西奥多拉夫人是神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易许可证{/g}的持有人，拥有着无与伦比的权力与资源。无论您的地位有多么优越，我都希望您不要因为缺乏尊重或缺乏远见而招致她的愤怒，西奥多拉夫人尤为鄙夷这两种缺陷。”

languages.text: «Prefiero no hablar de la Lord Capitán a sus espaldas, y menos en su propia nave. ¡Nadie sabe mejor que yo que los susurros siempre acaban llamando la atención!». {n}Voigtvir se ríe y niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Basta decir que su señoría es la portadora de la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente de Comercio{/g} y una mujer con un poder y privilegios inmensos. Por elevada que sea su propia posición, le pido que no la haga enfadar con tozudez o faltas de respeto. Lady Theodora detesta ambas cosas».
languages.original_text: "I would rather not discuss the Lord Captain behind her back — especially not on board her ship. No one knows better than I that whispers are wont to attract particularly close attention!" {n}Voigtvir laughs and shakes his head.{/n} "Suffice it to say that Her Ladyship is the bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}, and a woman of immense power and entitlement. However privileged your position may be, I ask that you do not incur her anger by being disrespectful or obtuse. Lady Theodora despises both qualities."

traits.locale_text: «Prefiero no hablar de la Lord Capitán a sus espaldas, y menos en su propia nave. ¡Nadie sabe mejor que yo que los susurros siempre acaban llamando la atención!». {n}Voigtvir se ríe y niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Basta decir que su señoría es la portadora de la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente de Comercio{/g} y una mujer con un poder y privilegios inmensos. Por elevada que sea su propia posición, le pido que no la haga enfadar con tozudez o faltas de respeto. Lady Theodora detesta ambas cosas».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンのことを陰で、特に彼女の船内で語るのは避けたい。噂話が特に注目を集めやすいことを私以上に知っている人はいないだろう！」{n}ボイトヴィルは笑いながら頭を振る。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンは神聖な{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}通商許可証{/g}の持ち主であり、計り知れない権力と力を持った女性であると言えば十分でしょう。あなたの立場にいかなる特権があっても、無礼や鈍感な態度で彼女の怒りを招かないようにお願いします。シオドーラ様はこの両方の性質を軽蔑しておられます」
languages.original_text: "I would rather not discuss the Lord Captain behind her back — especially not on board her ship. No one knows better than I that whispers are wont to attract particularly close attention!" {n}Voigtvir laughs and shakes his head.{/n} "Suffice it to say that Her Ladyship is the bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}, and a woman of immense power and entitlement. However privileged your position may be, I ask that you do not incur her anger by being disrespectful or obtuse. Lady Theodora despises both qualities."

traits.locale_text: 「船長のことを彼女の陰で語るのは避けたい。特に彼女の船内では。ささやきが特に注目を集めやすいことを私以上に知っている人はいないだろう！」{n}ボイドヴィルは笑いながら頭を振る。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンは神聖な{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}貿易令状{/g}の持ち主であり、計り知れない権力と力を持った女性であると言えば十分でしょう。あなたの立場にいかなる特権があっても、無礼な態度や鈍感な態度で彼女の怒りを招かないようにお願いします。レディ・テオドラはこの両方の性質を軽蔑しておられます」

「ロード・キャプテンのことを陰で、特に彼女の船内で語るのは避けたい。噂話が特に注目を集めやすいことを私以上に知っている人はいないだろう！」{n}ボイトヴィルは笑いながら頭を振る。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンは神聖な{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}通商許可証{/g}の持ち主であり、計り知れない権力と力を持った女性であると言えば十分でしょう。あなたの立場にいかなる特権があっても、無礼や鈍感な態度で彼女の怒りを招かないようにお願いします。シオドーラ様はこの両方の性質を軽蔑しておられます」

languages.original_text: "I would rather not discuss the Lord Captain behind her back — especially not on board her ship. No one knows better than I that whispers are wont to attract particularly close attention!" {n}Voigtvir laughs and shakes his head.{/n} "Suffice it to say that Her Ladyship is the bearer of the sacred Warrant of Trade, and a woman of immense power and entitlement. However privileged your position may be, I ask that you do not incur her anger by being disrespectful or obtuse. Lady Theodora despises both qualities."

languages.text: « Je ne tiens pas à discuter de la seigneure-capitaine dans son dos, en particulier à bord de son vaisseau. Nul mieux que moi ne sait que les murmures tendent à attirer l'attention ! » {n}Voigtvir éclate de rire en secouant la tête.{/n} « Disons simplement que Sa Seigneurie est porteuse de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} sacrée. C'est une femme détentrice d'un pouvoir et de droits considérables. Quels que soient les privilèges dont vous jouissez, je vous conjure de ne pas provoquer sa colère en vous montrant {mf|irrespectueux ou obtus|irrespectueuse ou obtuse}. Dame Théodora a ces deux défauts en horreur. »
languages.original_text: "I would rather not discuss the Lord Captain behind her back — especially not on board her ship. No one knows better than I that whispers are wont to attract particularly close attention!" {n}Voigtvir laughs and shakes his head.{/n} "Suffice it to say that Her Ladyship is the bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}, and a woman of immense power and entitlement. However privileged your position may be, I ask that you do not incur her anger by being disrespectful or obtuse. Lady Theodora despises both qualities."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne tiens pas à discuter de la seigneure-capitaine dans son dos, en particulier à bord de son vaisseau. Nul mieux que moi ne sait que les murmures tendent à attirer l'attention ! » {n}Voigtvir éclate de rire en secouant la tête.{/n} « Disons simplement que Sa Seigneurie est porteuse de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} sacrée. C'est une femme détentrice d'un pouvoir et de droits considérables. Quels que soient les privilèges dont vous jouissez, je vous conjure de ne pas provoquer sa colère en vous montrant {mf|irrespectueux ou obtus|irrespectueuse ou obtuse}. Dame Théodora a ces deux défauts en horreur. »

languages.text: "Ich spreche lieber nicht hinter ihrem Rücken über den Lord Captain – schon gar nicht an Bord ihres Schiffs. Niemand weiß besser als ich, dass Geflüster besonders viel Aufmerksamkeit erregt!" {n}Voigtvir lacht und schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Es sei lediglich gesagt, dass Ihre Ladyschaft den heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} führt und eine Frau von immenser Macht und Befugnissen ist. So privilegiert Eure Position auch sein mag, ich rate Euch, nicht durch Respektlosigkeit oder Begriffsstutzigkeit ihren Zorn zu erregen. Beide Eigenschaften verabscheut Lady Theodora."
languages.original_text: "I would rather not discuss the Lord Captain behind her back — especially not on board her ship. No one knows better than I that whispers are wont to attract particularly close attention!" {n}Voigtvir laughs and shakes his head.{/n} "Suffice it to say that Her Ladyship is the bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}, and a woman of immense power and entitlement. However privileged your position may be, I ask that you do not incur her anger by being disrespectful or obtuse. Lady Theodora despises both qualities."

traits.locale_text: "Ich spreche lieber nicht hinter ihrem Rücken über den Lord Captain – schon gar nicht an Bord ihres Schiffs. Niemand weiß besser als ich, dass Geflüster besonders viel Aufmerksamkeit erregt!" {n}Voigtvir lacht und schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Es sei lediglich gesagt, dass Ihre Ladyschaft den heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} führt und eine Frau von immenser Macht und Befugnissen ist. So privilegiert Eure Position auch sein mag, ich rate Euch, nicht durch Respektlosigkeit oder Begriffsstutzigkeit ihren Zorn zu erregen. Beide Eigenschaften verabscheut Lady Theodora."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'ın ardından konuşmamayı yeğlerim. Bilhassa gemisindeyken. Fısıltıların dikkatleri kolayca cezbedebileceğini benden iyi bilen yoktur!" {n}Voigtvir gülerek başını sallıyor.{/n} "Leydi Hazretleri'nin kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ticari Ruhsatname'nin{/g} hamili, muazzam kudrete ve yetkiye sahip bir kadın olduğunu söylemem kâfidir sanırım. Mevkiniz ne kadar ayrıcalıklı olsa da saygısızlık veya lakayıtlık ederek öfkesini uyandırmamanızı rica ederim. Leydi Theodora ikisinden de hazzetmez."
languages.original_text: "I would rather not discuss the Lord Captain behind her back — especially not on board her ship. No one knows better than I that whispers are wont to attract particularly close attention!" {n}Voigtvir laughs and shakes his head.{/n} "Suffice it to say that Her Ladyship is the bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}, and a woman of immense power and entitlement. However privileged your position may be, I ask that you do not incur her anger by being disrespectful or obtuse. Lady Theodora despises both qualities."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan'ın ardından konuşmamayı yeğlerim. Bilhassa da gemisindeyken. Fısıltıların dikkatleri kolayca cezbedebileceğini benden iyi bilen yoktur!" {n}Voigtvir gülerek başını sallıyor.{/n} "Leydi Hazretleri'nin kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ticari Ruhsatname{/g}'yi taşıdığını, muazzam kudrete ve yetkiye sahip bir kadın olduğunu söylemem kâfidir sanırım. Mevkiniz ne kadar ayrıcalıklı olsa da saygısızlık veya lakayıtlık ederek öfkesini uyandırmamanızı rica ederim. Leydi Theodora ikisinden de hazzetmez."
